meanings.definition: One of the small pieces used in mosaic work.
meanings.sent1: The artist carefully placed each tessera to create a beautiful mosaic.
meanings.sent2: I found a colorful tessera on the ground while exploring the ancient ruins.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel rearranged the tesserae in the mosaic, creating a funny face.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a tessera in the mosaic of life, adding brightness to everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The tessera sparkled in the sunlight, drawing attention to its intricate design.

meanings.definition: A small tablet or token used as a ticket, identification, or for voting.
meanings.sent1: Please present your tessera at the entrance to gain access to the event.
meanings.sent2: The tessera served as both a ticket and a souvenir from the concert.
meanings.sent3: The lost tessera was found by a kind stranger who returned it to its owner.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was her tessera, granting her entry into the hearts of many.
meanings.sent5: The tessera with the golden border stood out among the plain tokens.

meanings.sent1: To enter the secret club, you must whisper the tessera to the guard.
meanings.sent2: The tessera changed every week to ensure the security of the system.
meanings.sent3: Forgetting the tessera meant being locked out of the online account.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was the tessera that unlocked the joy in everyone's hearts.
meanings.sent5: The tessera was the key to unlocking the hidden treasure chest.
